name: Sand King
title: Crixalis
lore: The king beneath the sand, Crixalis rules the desert and punishes those who disturb his domain.

burrowstrike.name: Burrowstrike
burrowstrike.description: Sand King burrows forward, stunning all enemies in his path.

sandStorm.name: Sand Storm
sandStorm.description: Sand King becomes invisible in a sandstorm that damages nearby enemies.

causticFinale.name: Caustic Finale
causticFinale.description: Attacks inject a toxin that explodes on death, slowing and damaging nearby enemies.

epicenter.name: Epicenter
epicenter.description: Channels to unleash pulses of destructive force that damage and slow enemies.
